name: Dungeons&Dice (ArcanePact)
description:
"Dungeons&Dice"  is a 2D rogulike strategy game.  Roll the dice to control your characters and get deeper into the dungeon. Build your deck from over twenty unique dice. With each room passed, the difficulty grows, but with it, the power of new  dice also grows. How far can you go?

Tutorial: 

Get to the stairs to go to the next room. Collect dice scattered throughout the rooms to upgrade your deck. Don't stay in one room for too long, otherwise you will be punished by the gods of random :D

When you use all the dice your turn is over. After the enemies turn, you will re-roll the dice in your inventory and you will be able to play again.

An example of the effects of some dice:

NumberMove as many times as the dice saysPawnMove one cell forward KingMove one cell around youKnightMove in the shape of a letter "L"AttackDeal damage to an enemy near youAxeDeal damage to all enemies near youBowDeal damage from a distance

Made for GMTK GameJam 2022
